topic: How to package WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to package WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Packaging WASM Targets Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide will walk you through the process of packaging WebAssembly (WASM) targets using FastAPI and Python 3.12+. We'll cover setting up the environment, creating a basic FastAPI application, preparing WASM files, and building the final package.
key_points: Integrate WASM into the FastAPI application
Build and run the FastAPI application

code_examples.code: pip install fastapi uvicorn aiofiles websockets

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this guide.
Make sure to use the latest versions of FastAPI, uvicorn, aiofiles, and websockets.
caveats: This guide assumes you have a basic understanding of Python and FastAPI.
WebAssembly (WASM) support may require additional setup depending on your development environment.
